headline: The Last Dance: Warren Buffett Doubles Down on These 2 Stocks
summary: Warren Buffett, the legendary Oracle of Omaha, has confirmed that he’ll be stepping down as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway at the end of the year. While he’ll officially hand over the reins, investors are still watching his every move – especially as he takes what may be his final bold swings in the market. True to form, Buffett isn’t chasing hype. Instead, he’s reinforcing his long-held playbook: invest in companies with strong fundamentals, dependable dividends, and time-tested business models. Tha
